mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article_comment(article_id ,comment_id ) values (#{articleID},#{commentID}); INSERT INTO user_comment(user_id ,comment_id ) values (#{userID},#{commentID});
mapper.select: select c.id, c.body , c.like_count , c.root_id , c.parent_id , c.creation_time , c.modify_time , u.icon , u.nickname , u.username from article_comment ac left join (comment c, user_comment uc , `user` u ) on ac.comment_id = c.id and c.id = uc.comment_id and uc.user_id = u.id where ac.article_id = #{articleID}
